00023 void FileListManager::onAdd() {
00024         
00025         QStringList files = QFileDialog::getOpenFileNames(this, 
00026                 tr("Select the files you want to add"), baseLocation_.absolutePath());
00027 
00028         // if nothing was chosen or cancel was clicked
00029         if (files.isEmpty()) {
00030                 return;
00031         }
00032 
00033         // create QDir instance that refers to the base location.
00034         QDir baseDir(baseLocation_.absoluteDir());
00035 
00036         // add all paths to list
00037         foreach (QString item, files) {
00038 
00039                 // if a file path is empty then dont append it
00040                 if (item.isEmpty()) {
00041                         continue;
00042                 }
00043 
00044                 // create a relative path from base to selected file and clean it 
00045                 model_.appendItem(QDir::cleanPath(baseDir.relativeFilePath(item)));
00046 
00047                 // inform that content of the widget has changed
00048                 emit contentChanged();
00049         }
00050 }
00051 
00052 void FileListManager::onEdit() {
00053         
00054         // ask the view for the selected index
00055         QModelIndex index = view_.currentIndex();
00056 
00057         // if index was invalid (nothing was chosen)
00058         if (!index.isValid()) {
00059                 return;
00060         }
00061 
00062         // get the old text that is currently stored in the model
00063         QString oldFile = model_.data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00064 
00065         QString newFile = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName(this, 
00066                 tr("Select a new file"), baseLocation_.absolutePath());
00067 
00068         // create QDir instance that refers to the base location.
00069         QDir baseDir(baseLocation_.absoluteDir());
00070 
00071         // create a new file path to selected file that is relative to the base
00072         QString newRelFile = QDir::cleanPath(baseDir.relativeFilePath(newFile));
00073 
00074         // if new relative path is empty then dont append it
00075         if (newRelFile.isEmpty()) {
00076                 return;
00077         }
00078 
00079         // if the file path changed
00080         else if (oldFile != newRelFile) {
00081                 model_.replace(index, newRelFile);
00082 
00083                 // inform that content of the widget has changed
00084                 emit contentChanged();
00085         }
00086 }
